medium:
Medium: rayon (?) and silk
Technique: jacquard woven.  4 & 1 satin with alternate wefts (yellow and black) making long floats as pattern requires.  Color added by stencil (or block) after fabric was woven.
description: Woven and stencilled, shaded arches with flowers.
